about: My progressive background within auditing and consulting department in one of Big Four provides marketable strengths in key Accounting, Finance and Auditing areas.As Auditor Senior Manager of a number of engagements and results-oriented problem solver, I have maintained a consistent track record for high achievements and profitability by meeting project goals, project dates and customer needs/objectives. My professional experience has developed through various customers, leaders in their own industry, such as Health Care (3 years as manager responsible), Chemicals & Pharmaceutical, Automotive and Energy, including some experience in the Transaction Services and Forensic departments. The Audit engagements were respectively performed in compliance with ISA or PCAOB and Italian GAAP, IFRS and US-GAAP (including SoX experience). From February 2009 to December 2011, worked as Financial Controller in a multinational industrial company located in Italy (near Pavia). This experience increases my knowledge in relation to budget/forecast preparation, analysis of monthly variances, analysis of production costs by products driving also market strategy. From February 2012, I start a new engagement as Responsible of Controlling Department (role not present in the Company) of an Italian production Company with site also abroad (Spain, China, Netherlands & Argentina) growing from Nov'12 as Group Finance Mgr.  Based on my experience and attitude to work by project Iâ€™m interesting also to engage as Temporary Management.Specialties: Updating course on Italian and International accounting principles (IFRS & US-GAAP).Informatics Knowledge: strong skilled in using Word, Excel, Power point, Dynamics AX (Microsoft ERP) and Internetknowledge of SAP, Mac and Access
